Text.Page:
It's time for Thulsa to meet his end. Will you join me in hitting the legion where it hurts, once and for all?

We're overrun with Tenebrara dreadweavers and destroyers. Their numbers are many, but the "great god" Thulsa is nothing without his minions. Defeat the Tenebraras...and bring me their heads.

Your courage is unparalleled.

Victory will be ours!

Get out there and get the bad guys. Let's do this!

Why are you still standing here? Go kill some Tenebraras!
